main

Class FileWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.FileWorker

  • public class FileWorker
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for working with program file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      FileWorker(java.lang.String code, java.lang.String lang, java.lang.String id_user, java.lang.String id_task)

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileWorker

        public FileWorker(java.lang.String code,
                  java.lang.String lang,
                  java.lang.String id_user,
                  java.lang.String id_task)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor of the class FileWorker (create file with code). Name of created file consisting of user ID and task ID.
        Parameters:
        code - contents of the file (class name is change for java file)
        lang - programming language
        id_user - user identifier
        id_task - task identifier
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if can't create/find program file
